title: Karen Haglof, No-Wave Guitarist Turned Doctor, Relaunches Music Career
teaser: Karen Haglof made her name as a guitarist on the ultra-competitive New York no-wave scene of the 1980s. Then she stopped playing and launched a career in medicine. Now she's back with a solo album.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
